author: parsonsd
msg: PiggyBacked acks sent on closeSeq & terminateSeq with mustUnderstand set to true breaks RSP spec.  Fixed so that all piggybacked acks are sent with mustUnderstand set to false.

author: gtully
msg: resolve https://issues.apache.org/activemq/browse/AMQ-2902 - ensure there is no exception on graceful close of vm transport, also have stack trace for transport exceptions at debug level, just toString at info level, test included, thanks

msg: TAP5-1297: Client-side validation of @Pattern is broken
